entry.title: Sunday: A few showers or drizzle. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers or drizzle beginning this afternoon. Fog patches along parts of the coast. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
